db:abstract.db:para: QML frontend for QButtonAxisInput C++ class. The axis value is controlled by buttons rather than a traditional analog input such as a joystick.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.7.

db:section.db:title: acceleration : real
db:section.db:para: Specifies the rate at which the axis value changes when a button is held

db:section.db:title: buttons : list<var>
db:section.db:para: Specifies the buttons which control the axis

db:section.db:title: deceleration : list<var>
db:section.db:para: Specifies the rate at which the axis value returns to normal when a button is released

db:section.db:title: scale : real
db:section.db:para: Specifies how the axis output value is scaled. No scaling is applied by default so it defaults to 1.
